node.display_long_description:
*更新内容*
●   新加入手势跟踪功能！快来用你自己的人类之手探索全新玩法！
●   打零工的时代到了，你们人类开不开心？提供五星级服务，享受无穷无尽的任务，尽在《度假模拟器》全新 DLC：《又要上班了》！
“欢迎来到《度假模拟器》！不用工作的你，可以跟随《工作模拟器》中的机器人管家，去体验轻松愉悦的假日时光。放下忙碌工作，准备好玩水放松，品尝水果点心，再给自己来一张轻松愉快的自拍！

趣味亮点：
● 前往最佳目的地，在假日岛屿放松心情，收获快乐回忆！
● 定制虚拟的自己，留下完美自拍！
● 挥挥手即可与多彩的机器人互动！
● 沉浸在令人放松的度假目的地，享受无拘无束的娱乐！
● 在玻璃般透明的海水里嬉戏，享受日光浴，不用担心双手沾满沙子！
● 连上装备，纵情玩耍！
● 提升冰雕技艺，为雪人编织手套！
● 舒适沉浸的虚拟现实体验，不用担心眩晕！

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Major Bug / Crash Fixes
• Corrected a save crash issue due to recursive save data references

Hand Tracking Fixes
• Improved timing of re-enabling of finger colliders on release so fingers are less likely to become stuck inside cups
• Improved on/off dials so they are easier to turn
• Updated stowing logic for the backpack to make items easier to stow over the shoulder
• Increased StoryParentBot’s acceptance radius for items so it is easier to hand things to bots using hand tracking
• Rock skipping is now slightly easier to do when using hand tracking
• Tweaked the Ukulele setup so it can be played more easily when using hand tracking

Gameplay Fixes
• Hot, hot tub water put into a cup is now hot
• OpsBot Screen is now referred to correctly in picture descriptions
• Pie photo descriptions no longer have “and”s with missing spaces
• Ice pick can now break objects out of ice blocks, including break out the hot tub controls
• Gravity no longer remains low if the exit burrito is used in the DiveSite
• Butter bottle no longer pours when not held
• Hotdog and sausage 3-packs now count properly as Hotdog Weiner Waffle in Infinite Waffle
• Items saved to backpack in melting state no longer get stuck in backpack

Visual Fixes
• Knitted books no longer turn black
• First DiveSite zone no longer has black outline in photos

Other
• Fixed various minor issues

nodes.title: Vacation Simulator Hand Tracking
nodes.body_text: Introducing experimental Hand Tracking for Vacation Simulator! Explore and interact with all Bots and activities that Vacation Island has to offer by using your very own HUMAN hands. Enjoy this new way to play, available now on Oculus Quest and Quest 2.

nodes.title: Vacation Simulator: Back to Job - DLC
nodes.body_text: Human, are you ready to gig? Become your own BossBot and provide 5-star service in our new free DLC, Vacation Simulator: Back to Job. As a Giglr Independent Contractor run the Vacation Island Poolside Cabana with GigBot at your side! Enjoy endless tasks with Infinite Mode as you cook, entertain, advise, and do whatever it takes to help bots experience [MAXIMUM RELAXATION].

node.reviewDescription: I can't recommend this enough. My 7 year old daughter has been absolutely blown away by the simulator series. Vacation simulator however is something special, the whole experience is very intuitive to kids and the playability is not linear by no means. My daughter is only 34% through the game and has had many hours of entertainment. Collecting moths and taking them back to the apartment, not part of the gameplay but something she enjoyed doing for many a session, a snowball fight with a bot, arguing with an angry ignorant bot, I enjoyed watching her play this so so much.  I asked her what she enjoyed most and she said " everything"  and something about bear claws???.  No spoilers but the reward you get after collecting 30 memories is amazing and made what was a fantastic game into a brilliant one, so says my daughter anyway. I don't often leave reviews but an exception has been made here to thank the creators of this series.  5 plus stars from me.
node.reviewTitle: A must own especially if u have kids.
